mdRecord.dcterms:title: Naso-pharyngoscope
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: George P. Pilling & Son Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contained in a cardboard box (not pictured), which includes notes on the top: "From George P. Pilling & Son, Co., 3451 Walnut Street, Philadelphia PA, To Dr. G.S. Fitz-Hugh, 104 E. Market Street, Charlottesville, VA"; and on the bottom: "To Drs. Hedges and Woodward, Charlottesville, VA". Used for examinations of the upper airway.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus
